attributes.title: HORRIBLE DONT USE!!!🥰
attributes.review: I HATE this app I really DONT RECOMMEND for anyone to use it took weeks for it to load after it just kept freezing all the time I didn’t get to use it the way I wanted too

attributes.title: would not recommend!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in order to support MY president😍 but after i downloaded it someone stole my identity, credit cards, and my girlfriend!! so now i do not support and WANT MY MONEY BACK TODD😭🧚🏻

attributes.title: If I could give zero (0) stars I would
attributes.review: This app reminds me of the time I bit into a chocolate cake. However, this was no ordinary chocolate cake. It was just an orange cake dyed brown, replaced with salt instead of sugar. What I’m trying to say is, the ORANGE cake is a fraud 🙃

attributes.title: Do NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app took hours to download I was downloading this app to support and graduate our president but it ask for my phone number I could not trust it but I did it overall this app was trash DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT NO DO NOT

attributes.title: Awful!!
attributes.review: It was glitching a lot😡 and then a second later there was a orange on my screen😔I got so scared that my phone almost broke because of this app.😤

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded it to see if it would help change my perspective on trump, turns out he’s still just a little 5 th grader who got his feelings hurt on tiktok and just wants to go agains our first amendment!!!!

attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch like crazy 🤪 it deleted my contacts and photos 😭 and it also took away my human rights as a queer person 💗💜💙✨

attributes.title: Ruined my phone?
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and it straight up crashed my phone - so horrible and I wish I had never downloaded. Deleting now!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever created
attributes.review: Trump is a racist all through the app I didn't appreciate anything said about anything particularly and he's mad he can't handle this control this country

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app stole my chicken nuggets!! And after that it kicked my pet lion and shot it claiming it had no right to growl at him! My fairies told me to calm down but after it put my fairies in a cage and sent them away to their native lands.
